summary: This bill addresses the issue of "Misbehaving Content Scrapers", likely concerning the unauthorized or disruptive scraping of online content, specifically from government websites. It directs scrapers to adhere to robots.txt guidelines and notes that their IP addresses may be rate-limited, suggesting attempts at content access have been excessive or inappropriate. The recommendation to use the GPO.gov Bulk Data Download service implies an effort to control data access and provide legitimate channels for content retrieval, promoting responsible data practices.
